text: Karmanye Vadhikaraste Ma Phaleshu Kadachana - You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
author: Bhagavad Gita 2.47

text: Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam - The world is one family.
author: Maha Upanishad

text: Yada Yada Hi Dharmasya Glanir Bhavati Bharata - Whenever there is a decline in righteousness, O Bharata, I manifest Myself.
author: Bhagavad Gita 4.7

text: Satyameva Jayate Nanritam - Truth alone triumphs, not falsehood.
author: Mundaka Upanishad

text: Ahimsa Paramo Dharma - Non-violence is the highest duty.
author: Mahabharata

text: Yogah Karmasu Kaushalam - Yoga is skill in action.
author: Bhagavad Gita 2.50

text: Dharmo Rakshati Rakshitah - Dharma protects those who protect it.
author: Manusmriti
